title: Workspace Schema Definition
description: Defines the structure for a schema version, including its metadata and the actual JSON schema it contains.

slug.description: A unique, machine-readable identifier for the schema. Typically lowercase with underscores.

name.description: A human-readable name for the schema.

description.description: A brief explanation of the schema's purpose.

status.description: The current lifecycle status of the schema version.

hash.description: The SHA-256 hash of the json_schema content, used for integrity checking.

is_enabled.description: A flag to indicate if this schema definition is currently enabled and usable.

json_schema.description: The actual JSON schema definition object that this record represents.

updated_at.description: The timestamp of when this record was last updated, in ISO 8601 format.

commited_at.description: The timestamp of when this version was committed or made active. Can be null if it's a draft.

commit_message.description: A message describing the changes in this version. Can be null.
